__e: Well, I'm sure that's extremely painful, but I think it'll be all right.
I know this is painful, but there's so much I need to know.
It's taken a long time and it's been very painful, but I'm free of you now and can live my own life.
You can imagine what a bitter blow it is to me...
You must understand that to me this doesn't make sense, this is ridiculous as well as painful for me.
Every place is sorrowful for me, because I miss you so much.
I know it's been a very distressing time for you.
It must have been painful for you coming home that same day
But I had to at least let you know

Learning from your own mistakes in your real business is VERY painful and expensive.
If you run out now, it'll be the hardest, most painful thing...
Painful as it may be, there is but one thing to be done.
You taught me so many things― the reason the sky is blue, the beauty of a mountain, that always, no matter how painful it may be... or how afraid you are, you must tell the truth.
Previously, the so-called finger research method was used, but today this very painful examination is not practiced.
If it's so much pain, don't do it.
And We left therein a sign for those who fear the painful punishment.
And that those who do not believe in the Hereafter - We have prepared for them a painful punishment.
Even if every sign should come to them, until they see the painful punishment.
